about_the_game:
"

Demon in the Mine of Fire

Demon in the Mine of Fire - A Level 3 One Shot Adventure for Shadowdark RPG


In recent days, a remarkable find has emerged during routine maintenance of the city sewer system: the entrance to a long-lost mine. While the city council initially welcomed this discovery with enthusiasm, the explorers dispatched to investigate uncovered a troubling development. Within the depths of the mine, a powerful demon has taken up residence, its presence hinting at malevolent intentions toward the city above. In light of this dire threat, adventurers must be mobilized to venture into the mine, neutralize any dangers lurking within, and confront the demon before its sinister plans can come to fruition. 


This concise dungeon delve was crafted using the intuitive randomization tables featured in the Shadowdark RPG Rule Book. With its user-friendly approach, even those with minimal RPG experience can seamlessly navigate the process, generating a fully-fledged dungeon map complete with encounter concepts. In this particular instance, the adventure's every aspect was determined through random rolls overseen by the writer's spouse, resulting in a thrilling and unpredictable journey awaiting the players.







This Shadowdark dungeon crawl is designed for an adventuring party of 4 or 5 at level 3



Produced by Bardic Mischief - David Cole. Map created using Dungeondraft. Artwork created using Midjourney Ai

"
